text:
Hi,

I am a NetSuite developer but we do not have Webhooks in our HubSpot subscription, but I hope I can help you forward.

Would you be able to get the HubSpot signature from the header?

*Security <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks#security|  >*

To ensure that the requests you're getting at your webhook endpoint are actually coming from HubSpot, HubSpot populates a `X-HubSpot-Signature` header with a SHA-256 hash of the concatenation of the app-secret for your application and the request body HubSpot is sending.
To verify this signature, concatenate the app secret of your application and the un-parsed request body of the request you're handling, and get a SHA-256 hash of the result. Compare the resulting hash with the value of the `X-HubSpot-Signature`. If these values match, then this verifies that this request came from HubSpot. Or, the request came from someone else who knows your application secret. It's important to keep this value secret.
If these values do not match, then this request may have been tampered with in-transit or someone may be spoofing webhook notifications to your endpoint.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks>

Hello community!!! I’m having an issue and I believe its a HubSpot bug… I’m using a form inside a custom module and I’m trying to redirect the forms to different urls in different pages that are using that custom module.

I’m using hbspt.forms.create cos I need to add a callback function on submit.

But whats happening is that the module.form_settings.form.redirect_url is showing empty and I cannot redirect after form submission.

I can change the inline thank you message per page with no issue, but when i select the redirect it shows empty.

Anyone knows what can be going on?
I sent a email with details
Can you also post what your hubl/js looks like for this?

How can we get delastage of contact in search api
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/search?hapikey>

Hey Shirley, unless you have a custom property set up, dealstage is not a contact property by default. You would need to query the contact for associated deal objects, then get the dealstage for those deals.

When creating a HubSpot app, are we required to set the Redirect URL field in the auth section? I found that it still works when I set the redirect url when making the api request while leaving this field blank. Is there any harm in leaving it blank?
